<a href="https://www.policygenius.com/life-insurance/no-zip-mlp-1/?utm_source=morningbrew&utm_medium=paid-email&utm_campaign=life-ins-aug-2020" style="border-bottom:none!important;" target="_blank" class=""><img alt="Policygenius" style="width:100%;max-width: 154px; display: inline; vertical-align: middle;" width="154" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL2NvbXBhbnkvbG9nby81My8xNTgxMDg4OTA4LVBHLkxvZ28uUkdCLkJsYWNrLnBuZyIsImJ1Y2tldCI6ImNvbWV0LW1vcm5pbmdicmV3IiwiZWRpdHMiOnsicmVzaXplIjp7IndpZHRoIjoxMDAwLCJoZWlnaHQiOm51bGx9fX0="></a>

<td style="padding-top:20px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Good morning. </strong>100 years ago today, women were granted the right to vote in the U.S. via the passage of the 19th Amendment. Today’s newsletter is dedicated to all those who fought for decades to make women’s suffrage a reality, and the people who continued to fight for voting rights in the years after 1920 when racial minorities, especially Black women, were blocked from the ballot box.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Keep reading the newsletter for a few more links marking this historic anniversary. </p>

<div class="c6 " style="margin-bottom:7px">
<!-- <![endif]-->
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
FINTECH
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/08/17/robinhood-raises-additional-funds-sets-sights-new-revenue-streams?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Robinhood Knows a Thing or Three About Raising Money
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<img alt="Robinhood illustration " style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC8yMTI3L3JvYmluaG9vZF9pbGx1c3RyYXRpb24uanBnIiwiYnVja2V0Ijoib3Nsby1wcm9kdWN0aW9uIiwiZWRpdHMiOnsicmVzaXplIjp7IndpZHRoIjoxMDAwLCJoZWlnaHQiOm51bGx9fX0=">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em></em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">The stock trading startup Robinhood announced a <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2020/08/17/robinhood-announces-another-mega-round-valuation-soars-to-11point2b.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">$200 million</a> Series G round yesterday, continuing its march through the fundraising alphabet. Robinhood’s updated 2020 funding report:</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>May: $280 million raised</span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>July: $320 million raised</span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Yesterday: $200 million raised</span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Know your brokerage: </strong>Robinhood rose to prominence by offering users a hassle-free signup process, sleek design, and zero-fee trading. Its latest round of funding values it at $11.2 billion, up almost $3 billion from May and nearly 9x its 2017 valuation.   </p>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">What’s behind the growth?</h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Robinhood is adding users faster than people who live alone in NYC add house plants. The company said it surpassed 13 million users in May, 3 million of which had jumped aboard since the start of 2020. And it’s making money off trades at a faster rate than its competitors, too. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>In June, Robinhood traders </span><span><a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2020/08/10/robinhood-reports-more-monthly-trades-than-rivals-charles-schwab-e-trade-combined.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">carried out</a></span><span> 4.3 million “daily average revenue trades,” a key metric used by brokerages. That topped TD Ameritrade and Interactive Brokers and exceeded the combined total of E-Trade and Charles Schwab. </span>
</li>
</ul>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">Keep a firm grip on those horses of yours</h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Robinhood’s key selling point is that it makes trading accessible to a wider range of people. But after a Robinhood user <a href="https://www.cnn.com/2020/06/19/business/robinhood-suicide-alex-kearns/index.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">died by suicide</a> in June when he saw a negative $730,000 balance in his account, critics pointed out that Robinhood may encourage reckless financial decisions by overly gamifying options trading. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Also slowing the Robinhood hype train: outages on one of the busiest trading days of the year and a </span><span><a href="https://techcrunch.com/2020/07/21/robinhood-uk-shutters/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">postponed rollout in the UK</a></span><span>. </span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Looking ahead...</strong>Robinhood’s latest fundraising round has investors wondering when it will finally go public. But eye-popping user growth ≠ profitability. Robinhood probably still <a href="https://www.marketwatch.com/articles/what-is-robinhood-apps-next-act-its-already-mastered-the-stock-market-game-51597451777?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">operates at a loss</a> as it pumps money back into the company and explores revenue streams beyond its core brokerage business. Two potential options: retirement planning and peer-to-peer money transfers. “We believe that if you’re going to have a single app on your phone, we want Robinhood to be the money app,” Robinhood’s COO told Barron's.</p>

<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
HIGHER ED
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/08/17/unc-cancels-inperson-instruction-1-week?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
UNC You Next Semester
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<img alt="UNC's campus" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC8yMTI4L3VuY19zX2NhbXB1cy5qcGciLCJidWNrZXQiOiJvc2xvLXByb2R1Y3Rpb24iLCJlZGl0cyI6eyJyZXNpemUiOnsid2lkdGgiOjEwMDAsImhlaWdodCI6bnVsbH19fQ==">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Wallpaper Flare</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">One week into the fall semester, the University of North Carolina announced it’s <a href="https://www.nbcnews.com/news/us-news/unc-chapel-hill-converts-remote-learning-after-reporting-135-new-n1236977?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">canceling in-person</a> instruction and moving undergraduate programs online. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">UNC has reported four COVID-19 clusters across residence halls and a frat house, with at least 130 students testing positive in the last week. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Was this inevitable? </strong>The Daily Tar Heel editorial board <a href="https://www.dailytarheel.com/article/2020/08/covid-clusters-edit-0816?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">didn't hold back</a> in criticizing UNC for reopening without following CDC and county health recommendations: "We all saw this coming. But university leadership should have expected students, many of whom are now living on their own for the first time, to be reckless."</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Before the semester started, 30 tenured faculty members wrote a letter to students telling them to stay home because “it is not safe for you to come to campus.”</span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Zoom out: </strong>UNC’s pivot is a red flag for schools across the country that have been watching closely and <a href="https://www.theverge.com/21367847/college-towns-campus-coronavirus-pandemic-university-michigan-ann-arbor?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">bracing for outbreaks</a> as students return. At Oklahoma State, an entire sorority is in quarantine after 23 members tested positive. And last week, Columbia, Johns Hopkins, Princeton, and Howard also moved instruction online.</p>

<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
ENERGY
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/08/17/trump-administration-opens-alaskas-arctic-refuge-drilling?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Trump Goes Where No Pres Has Drilled Before
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<img alt="Arctic National Wildlife Refuge" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC8yMTI1L2FyY3RpY19uYXRpb25hbF93aWxkbGlmZV9yZWZ1Z2UuanBnIiwiYnVja2V0Ijoib3Nsby1wcm9kdWN0aW9uIiwiZWRpdHMiOnsicmVzaXplIjp7IndpZHRoIjoxMDAwLCJoZWlnaHQiOm51bGx9fX0=">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Danielle Brigida, USFWS</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Yesterday, the Trump administration <a href="https://www.adn.com/business-economy/energy/2020/08/17/trump-finalizes-drilling-plan-for-alaskas-arctic-national-wildlife-refuge/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">approved plans</a> to allow drilling on 1.6 million acres of Alaska’s Arctic National Wildlife Refuge, the first time the South Carolina-sized wilderness will open for oil and gas extraction. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Alaska’s governor said up to 11.8 billion barrels could be tapped, and Interior Secretary David Bernhardt called it “a new chapter in American energy independence.” </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>It’s rare positive news for an industry walloped by the pandemic. Oil prices are at </span><span><a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/interior-secretary-to-approve-oil-drilling-in-alaska-s-arctic-refuge-11597667400?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">15-year lows</a></span><span>, global supplies are overflowing, and fossil fuel companies are </span><span><a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/06/28/chesapeake-energy-files-chapter-11-bankruptcy?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">going bankrupt</a></span><span>. </span>
</li>
</ul>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">That’s not counting the controversy</h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Republicans have tried sliding onto polar bears’ home turf for decades, but Democrats blocked their efforts... </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">...until 2017, when the GOP tax bill included a provision allowing lease sales in the refuge. The administration expedited the environmental review and appointed an adviser who allegedly <a href="https://www.politico.com/news/magazine/2020/08/08/trump-alaska-oil-wildlife-refuge-388548?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">sidelined</a> environmental concerns. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Sierra Club’s Lena Moffitt called the process “a sham from the start.” </span></li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px"><span>Opponents say drilling will harm local wildlife and Alaska’s indigenous population. </span></li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Looking ahead...</strong>when the government starts locking in leases soon, it’ll be harder for challengers to delay or undo plans in court. </p>

<img alt="" style="display: inline-block; width: 25px" width="25" src="https://media.sailthru.com/5z8/1k4/4/2/5e86576e04837.jpg">

</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="#" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">

<td style="padding-right:15px;padding-bottom:15px;padding-left:15px;padding-top:0px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">A little birdie told us we’d better start looking into life insurance policies with <a href="https://www.policygenius.com/life-insurance/no-zip-mlp-1/?utm_source=morningbrew&utm_medium=paid-email&utm_campaign=life-ins-aug-2020" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Policygenius</a> because insurance rates only increase as you age.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">“Huh? Aren’t we a little too young for life insurance?” we asked.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">But the bird flew away, and we were left pondering its significance as a strand of gray hair began to sprout and our knees began to hurt.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Maybe this bird was on to something…</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">So we turned to the insurance aficionados at Policygenius to <a href="https://www.policygenius.com/life-insurance/no-zip-mlp-1/?utm_source=morningbrew&utm_medium=paid-email&utm_campaign=life-ins-aug-2020" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">calculate our personalized life insurance quotes</a> from top companies and bring them together in one place to get the best rate.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Their team handles the paperwork and red tape at no extra cost. <strong style="color:#000">You could save up to 40% (that's $1,500 or more per year) by comparing life insurance options with Policygenius</strong>.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">But you don’t have to take the advice of copywriters who talk to birds. <a href="https://www.policygenius.com/life-insurance/no-zip-mlp-1/?utm_source=morningbrew&utm_medium=paid-email&utm_campaign=life-ins-aug-2020" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Talk to the experts at Policygenius</a> and get a free quote today. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Learn more <a href="https://www.policygenius.com/life-insurance/no-zip-mlp-1/?utm_source=morningbrew&utm_medium=paid-email&utm_campaign=life-ins-aug-2020" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">here</a>. </p>

<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<th class="card" style="text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px">
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding: 15px;">
<h3 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0">
HOUSING
</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/08/17/making-sense-housing-market?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Bob Is Loving This Housing Market
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding-right:15px;padding-bottom:15px;padding-left:15px;padding-top:0px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">As the pandemic squeezed most people’s lives into the confines of their living spaces, homeowners, homebuyers, and homebuilders have each been affected in different ways.  </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Builders are pumped:</strong> An index measuring homebuilder sentiment matched its <a href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2020-08-17/low-rates-push-homebuilder-optimism-to-highest-level-since-1998?sref=KkPzpZvz&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">highest level</a> ever yesterday. Why? There is a healthy amount of demand from buyers and not enough homes to meet it. </p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Also, the 30-year fixed mortgage rate </span><span><a href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2020-08-06/u-s-mortgage-rates-plunge-to-record-low-2-88-for-30-year-loans?sref=KkPzpZvz&utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">bottomed out</a></span><span> at 2.88% in August, the lowest point on record. Those low borrowing rates are boosting homebuyers' appetites.  </span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Many owners are less pumped:</strong> With the unemployment rate still in the double digits, fewer homeowners are able to meet their mortgage payments. Residential mortgage delinquency rates posted their <a href="https://www.reuters.com/article/us-usa-economy/as-u-s-homebuilder-confidence-matches-record-high-mortgage-delinquencies-rise-idUSKCN25D1SI?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">largest-ever quarterly increase</a> in Q2, according to the Mortgage Bankers Association, jumping to over 8%. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Zoom out:</strong> The home improvement industry has been <a href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/home-depot-covid-coronavirus-home-improvement-lockdowns-stimulus-check-remodel-11597426959?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">surging</a> the last few months. Per Unacast, daily foot traffic at Home Depot since April is up at least 35% over last year, while Lowe’s reported 11.2% comparable sales growth in the spring quarter. Both retailers report earnings this week.</p>

<td style="padding: 15px;">

</h3>
<h1 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px">
<a href="https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/08/17/diageo-agrees-buy-aviation-american-gin-spirits-brands-610-million?email={{profile.email}}" target="_blank" style="color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;">
<font color="#000000">
Ryan Reynolds Is #Ginning
</font></a>
</h1>
</td>

<!--[if mso]>
<img alt="Deadpool clapping" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" height=349 src="https://media.giphy.com/media/l0MYDGA3Du1hBR4xG/giphy.gif">

<!--<![endif]-->
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Giphy</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">What do Ryan Reynolds, George Clooney, and 17th century Welsh privateer Sir Henry Morgan have in common? They’ve all benefited handsomely from liquor brands. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Reynolds, the voice of Pikachu and co-owner of Aviation American Gin, <a href="https://www.marketwatch.com/story/diageo-adds-ryan-reynolds-aviation-american-gin-to-its-portfolio-with-deal-that-values-the-brand-up-to-610-million-2020-08-17?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">agreed to sell</a> his company to British spirits giant Diageo yesterday, which scooped up a few other liquor brands in a deal worth up to $610 million.</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>
</span><span><strong style="color:#000">The details: </strong></span><span>$335 million will arrive when the deal closes, with the remaining $275 million paid out over 10 years based on performance. </span>
</li>
</ul>
<h2 style="font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0">Now back to the celebrities </h2>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">They’re <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2020/08/17/diageo-to-buy-ryan-reynolds-backed-aviation-gin-for-610-million.html?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">getting very rich</a> off of liquor. George Clooney is the ultimate case study after selling the Casamigos tequila brand he cofounded to Diageo for up to $1 billion in 2017. Other celebs including actors The Rock, Shay Mitchell, and Bryan Cranston and Aaron Paul have recently launched their own alcohol lines to capitalize on the movement. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Pulse check on the gin industry: </strong>growing fast in Europe, still trending up in the U.S. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Looking ahead...</strong>which actor is going to launch a spiked seltzer brand? </p>

<img alt="Food52 CEO Amanda Hesser" style="display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;" width="670" class="story-header-image" src="https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC8yMTI5L2FtYW5kYV9oZXNzbGVyLmpwZyIsImJ1Y2tldCI6Im9zbG8tcHJvZHVjdGlvbiIsImVkaXRzIjp7InJlc2l6ZSI6eyJ3aWR0aCI6MTAwMCwiaGVpZ2h0IjpudWxsfX19">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;">
<small><em>Food52</em></small>
</p>
<table width="100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0" style="border-collapse: collapse;">
<tr>
<td style="padding:15px">
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">In this week’s edition of Own the Morning, we talk to food impresario Amanda Hesser. Chances are if you’ve eaten something delicious in the last decade, at least some of it is thanks to Amanda. Quick bio:</p>
<ul style="margin-top:0;padding-left:30px">
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Cofounder and CEO of the culinary hub </span><span><a href="https://food52.com/?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">Food52</a></span><span>
</span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Author of a bestselling </span><span><a href="https://wwnorton.com/books/9781324002277?utm_source=morning_brew" target="_blank" class="link" rel="noopener" style="border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333">NYT cookbook</a></span><span>
</span>
</li>
<li style="line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px">
<span>Made a cameo as herself in the Nora Ephron film </span><span><em>Julie & Julia</em></span><span>
</span>
</li>
</ul>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">We slid into Amanda’s DMs to ask her about the food media industry, how she owns the morning, and most importantly, her favorite fast food burgers. </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">3 things you do in the morning that are essential to starting your day off right.</strong></p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">1) Make our bed 2) drink a large glass of room temperature water 3) put on perfume (Rose Of No Man's Land by Byredo).</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">1 thing you do in the morning that other people definitely don’t do.</strong></p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">This is embarrassing for a food person to admit and I appreciate you not judging, but my husband makes cold brew and I heat it in the microwave.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">1 thing about your industry no one outside of it understands.</strong></p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">How much work goes into developing and photographing a recipe.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">1 thing you are snobby about.</strong></p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">I'm <em>particular</em> about kitchen countertops—how much stuff is on them, how it's arranged. Also particular about pantries, and how food is stored and organized. Your kitchen and pantry should feel calming and welcoming, not like a grocery store exploded in it.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">Rank these: Five Guys, In-N-Out, Shake Shack</strong></p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Shake Shack, In-N-Out, then Five Guys off in the distance.</p>

<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px">Given today’s anniversary of the ratification of the 19th Amendment, we thought we’d quiz your knowledge of the amendments. We grabbed a few quotes from various tweaks to the U.S. Constitution; you have to fill in the blanks.</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">2nd Amendment: </strong>“A well regulated _____, being necessary to the security of a free State, the right of the people to keep and bear Arms, shall not be infringed.” </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">8th Amendment: </strong>“Excessive bail shall not be required, nor excessive fines imposed, nor _____ _____ _____ punishments inflicted.” </p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">18th Amendment: </strong>“After one year from the ratification of this article the manufacture, sale, or transportation of _____  ______  within, the importation thereof into, or the exportation thereof from the United States…”</p>
<p style="line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px"><strong style="color:#000">26th Amendment: </strong>“The right of citizens of the United States, who are eighteen years of age or older, to ____ shall not be denied or abridged by the United States or by any State on account of age.”</p>
</td>

The world’s largest cryptocurrency \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2020-08-17/bitcoin-surges-past-12-000-with-advocates-heralding-new-era?srnd=premium\u0026sref=KkPzpZvz\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ezoomed\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e past $12,000 yesterday to notch its highest level since July 2019. Bitcoin is one of the best-performing assets this year, up about 70%.\u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\n\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003c/tr\u003e\n\u003c/table\u003e\n\u003c/th\u003e\n\u003c/tr\u003e\n\u003c/table\u003e\n\u003c!--[if !mso ]\u003e\u003c! -- --\u003e\n\u003c/div\u003e\n\u003c/div\u003e\n\u003c!-- \u003c![endif]--\u003e\n\u003c!-- END MARKETS --\u003e\n\u003c!-- ARTICLE ---\u003e\n\u003c!--[if !mso ]\u003e\u003c! -- --\u003e\n\u003cdiv class=\"c6 \" style=\"margin-bottom:7px\"\u003e\n\u003c!-- \u003c![endif]--\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003cth class=\"card\" style=\"text-align:left;font-weight:400;font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#333;display:block;background-color:#fff;border-radius:15px;border:1px solid #e6e6e6;border-collapse:collapse;box-shadow:none;margin-bottom:0px\"\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding: 15px;\"\u003e\n\u003ch3 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:16px;color:#1c7ff2;font-weight:700;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0\"\u003e\nFINTECH\n\u003c/h3\u003e\n\u003ch1 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:24px;color:#333;font-weight:700;margin-bottom:0;line-height:26px;margin-top:8px\"\u003e\n\u003ca href=\"https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/08/17/robinhood-raises-additional-funds-sets-sights-new-revenue-streams?email={{profile.email}}\" target=\"_blank\" style=\"color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;\"\u003e\n\u003cfont color=\"#000000\"\u003e\nRobinhood Knows a Thing or Three About Raising Money\n\u003c/font\u003e\u003c/a\u003e\n\u003c/h1\u003e\n\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003c/tr\u003e\n\u003c/table\u003e\n\u003cimg alt=\"Robinhood illustration \" style=\"display: block; width: 100%; max-width: 670px;\" width=\"670\" class=\"story-header-image\" src=\"https://dlp31coh2a67q.cloudfront.net/eyJrZXkiOiJ1cGxvYWRzL21lZGl1bS9hc3NldC8yMTI3L3JvYmluaG9vZF9pbGx1c3RyYXRpb24uanBnIiwiYnVja2V0Ijoib3Nsby1wcm9kdWN0aW9uIiwiZWRpdHMiOnsicmVzaXplIjp7IndpZHRoIjoxMDAwLCJoZWlnaHQiOm51bGx9fX0=\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;\"\u003e\n\u003csmall\u003e\u003cem\u003e\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/small\u003e\n\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eThe stock trading startup Robinhood announced a \u003ca href=\"https://www.cnbc.com/2020/08/17/robinhood-announces-another-mega-round-valuation-soars-to-11point2b.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003e$200 million\u003c/a\u003e Series G round yesterday, continuing its march through the fundraising alphabet. Robinhood’s updated 2020 funding report:\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eMay: $280 million raised\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eJuly: $320 million raised\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eYesterday: $200 million raised\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eKnow your brokerage: \u003c/strong\u003eRobinhood rose to prominence by offering users a hassle-free signup process, sleek design, and zero-fee trading. Its latest round of funding values it at $11.2 billion, up almost $3 billion from May and nearly 9x its 2017 valuation.   \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eWhat’s behind the growth?\u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eRobinhood is adding users faster than people who live alone in NYC add house plants. The company said it surpassed 13 million users in May, 3 million of which had jumped aboard since the start of 2020. And it’s making money off trades at a faster rate than its competitors, too. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eIn June, Robinhood traders \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.cnbc.com/2020/08/10/robinhood-reports-more-monthly-trades-than-rivals-charles-schwab-e-trade-combined.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ecarried out\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e 4.3 million “daily average revenue trades,” a key metric used by brokerages. That topped TD Ameritrade and Interactive Brokers and exceeded the combined total of E-Trade and Charles Schwab. \u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eKeep a firm grip on those horses of yours\u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eRobinhood’s key selling point is that it makes trading accessible to a wider range of people. But after a Robinhood user \u003ca href=\"https://www.cnn.com/2020/06/19/business/robinhood-suicide-alex-kearns/index.html?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003edied by suicide\u003c/a\u003e in June when he saw a negative $730,000 balance in his account, critics pointed out that Robinhood may encourage reckless financial decisions by overly gamifying options trading. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eAlso slowing the Robinhood hype train: outages on one of the busiest trading days of the year and a \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://techcrunch.com/2020/07/21/robinhood-uk-shutters/?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003epostponed rollout in the UK\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e. \u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eLooking ahead...\u003c/strong\u003eRobinhood’s latest fundraising round has investors wondering when it will finally go public. But eye-popping user growth ≠ profitability. Robinhood probably still \u003ca href=\"https://www.marketwatch.com/articles/what-is-robinhood-apps-next-act-its-already-mastered-the-stock-market-game-51597451777?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eoperates at a loss\u003c/a\u003e as it pumps money back into the company and explores revenue streams beyond its core brokerage business. Two potential options: retirement planning and peer-to-peer money transfers. “We believe that if you’re going to have a single app on your phone, we want Robinhood to be the money app,” Robinhood’s COO told Barron's.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c!-- SOCIAL LINKS --\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eOne week into the fall semester, the University of North Carolina announced it’s \u003ca href=\"https://www.nbcnews.com/news/us-news/unc-chapel-hill-converts-remote-learning-after-reporting-135-new-n1236977?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ecanceling in-person\u003c/a\u003e instruction and moving undergraduate programs online. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eUNC has reported four COVID-19 clusters across residence halls and a frat house, with at least 130 students testing positive in the last week. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eWas this inevitable? \u003c/strong\u003eThe Daily Tar Heel editorial board \u003ca href=\"https://www.dailytarheel.com/article/2020/08/covid-clusters-edit-0816?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003edidn't hold back\u003c/a\u003e in criticizing UNC for reopening without following CDC and county health recommendations: \"We all saw this coming. But university leadership should have expected students, many of whom are now living on their own for the first time, to be reckless.\"\u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eBefore the semester started, 30 tenured faculty members wrote a letter to students telling them to stay home because “it is not safe for you to come to campus.”\u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eZoom out: \u003c/strong\u003eUNC’s pivot is a red flag for schools across the country that have been watching closely and \u003ca href=\"https://www.theverge.com/21367847/college-towns-campus-coronavirus-pandemic-university-michigan-ann-arbor?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ebracing for outbreaks\u003c/a\u003e as students return. At Oklahoma State, an entire sorority is in quarantine after 23 members tested positive. And last week, Columbia, Johns Hopkins, Princeton, and Howard also moved instruction online.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c!-- SOCIAL LINKS --\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;padding-left:10px;margin-top:5px;margin-bottom:0px;line-height:14px;\"\u003e\n\u003csmall\u003e\u003cem\u003eDanielle Brigida, USFWS\u003c/em\u003e\u003c/small\u003e\n\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding:15px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eYesterday, the Trump administration \u003ca href=\"https://www.adn.com/business-economy/energy/2020/08/17/trump-finalizes-drilling-plan-for-alaskas-arctic-national-wildlife-refuge/?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003eapproved plans\u003c/a\u003e to allow drilling on 1.6 million acres of Alaska’s Arctic National Wildlife Refuge, the first time the South Carolina-sized wilderness will open for oil and gas extraction. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eAlaska’s governor said up to 11.8 billion barrels could be tapped, and Interior Secretary David Bernhardt called it “a new chapter in American energy independence.” \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eIt’s rare positive news for an industry walloped by the pandemic. Oil prices are at \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.wsj.com/articles/interior-secretary-to-approve-oil-drilling-in-alaska-s-arctic-refuge-11597667400?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003e15-year lows\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e, global supplies are overflowing, and fossil fuel companies are \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.morningbrew.com/daily/stories/2020/06/28/chesapeake-energy-files-chapter-11-bankruptcy?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003egoing bankrupt\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e. \u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003ch2 style=\"font-family:Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:19px;font-weight:700;color:#000;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px;margin-right:0;margin-left:0\"\u003eThat’s not counting the controversy\u003c/h2\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eRepublicans have tried sliding onto polar bears’ home turf for decades, but Democrats blocked their efforts... \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e...until 2017, when the GOP tax bill included a provision allowing lease sales in the refuge. The administration expedited the environmental review and appointed an adviser who allegedly \u003ca href=\"https://www.politico.com/news/magazine/2020/08/08/trump-alaska-oil-wildlife-refuge-388548?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003esidelined\u003c/a\u003e environmental concerns. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eSierra Club’s Lena Moffitt called the process “a sham from the start.” \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\u003cspan\u003eOpponents say drilling will harm local wildlife and Alaska’s indigenous population. \u003c/span\u003e\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eLooking ahead...\u003c/strong\u003ewhen the government starts locking in leases soon, it’ll be harder for challengers to delay or undo plans in court. \u003c/p\u003e\n\u003c!-- SOCIAL LINKS style=\"color:#000000!important;text-decoration:none;border-bottom:none!important;\"\u003e\n\u003cfont color=\"#000000\"\u003e\nBob Is Loving This Housing Market\n\u003c/font\u003e\u003c/a\u003e\n\u003c/h1\u003e\n\u003c/td\u003e\n\u003c/tr\u003e\n\u003c/table\u003e\n\u003ctable width=\"100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" style=\"border-collapse: collapse;\"\u003e\n\u003ctr\u003e\n\u003ctd style=\"padding-right:15px;padding-bottom:15px;padding-left:15px;padding-top:0px\"\u003e\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003eAs the pandemic squeezed most people’s lives into the confines of their living spaces, homeowners, homebuyers, and homebuilders have each been affected in different ways.  \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eBuilders are pumped:\u003c/strong\u003e An index measuring homebuilder sentiment matched its \u003ca href=\"https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2020-08-17/low-rates-push-homebuilder-optimism-to-highest-level-since-1998?sref=KkPzpZvz\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ehighest level\u003c/a\u003e ever yesterday. Why? There is a healthy amount of demand from buyers and not enough homes to meet it. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cul style=\"margin-top:0;padding-left:30px\"\u003e\r\n\u003cli style=\"line-height:22px;margin-bottom:10px\"\u003e\n\u003cspan\u003eAlso, the 30-year fixed mortgage rate \u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e\u003ca href=\"https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2020-08-06/u-s-mortgage-rates-plunge-to-record-low-2-88-for-30-year-loans?sref=KkPzpZvz\u0026utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003ebottomed out\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/span\u003e\u003cspan\u003e at 2.88% in August, the lowest point on record. Those low borrowing rates are boosting homebuyers' appetites.  \u003c/span\u003e\n\u003c/li\u003e\r\n\u003c/ul\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eMany owners are less pumped:\u003c/strong\u003e With the unemployment rate still in the double digits, fewer homeowners are able to meet their mortgage payments. Residential mortgage delinquency rates posted their \u003ca href=\"https://www.reuters.com/article/us-usa-economy/as-u-s-homebuilder-confidence-matches-record-high-mortgage-delinquencies-rise-idUSKCN25D1SI?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003elargest-ever quarterly increase\u003c/a\u003e in Q2, according to the Mortgage Bankers Association, jumping to over 8%. \u003c/p\u003e\r\n\u003cp style=\"line-height:22px;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:15px\"\u003e\u003cstrong style=\"color:#000\"\u003eZoom out:\u003c/strong\u003e The home improvement industry has been \u003ca href=\"https://www.wsj.com/articles/home-depot-covid-coronavirus-home-improvement-lockdowns-stimulus-check-remodel-11597426959?utm_source=morning_brew\" target=\"_blank\" class=\"link\" rel=\"noopener\" style=\"border-bottom:2px solid #1c7ff2;text-decoration:none;color:#333\"\u003esurging\u003c/a\u003e the last few months. Per Unacast, daily foot traffic at Home Depot since April is up at least 35% over last year, while Lowe’s reported 11.2% comparable sales growth in the spring quarter.
